testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (search bar, buttons, navigation links)
Check for proper navigation structure with BeachStay Villas branding
Verify application shows real villa listings and search functionality
Confirm the app is not just a 'Vite + React' placeholder
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional BeachStay Villas features with villa search, navigation, and interactive elements
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or lacks villa rental functionality, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Content and Features Test
testCases.description: Test that homepage displays proper content and functionality
steps: Load the homepage at root URL
Verify hero section with beach villa background image
Check search form with location, check-in, check-out, and guests fields
Verify 'Featured Villas' section displays villa cards
Check 'Popular Beach Destinations' section
Verify navigation bar with BeachStay Villas logo and menu items
Test search functionality by entering a location
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays complete villa rental interface with search, featured villas, and destinations

testCases.name: Navigation and Routing Test
testCases.description: Test navigation menu and routing functionality
steps: Click on BeachStay Villas logo to verify it returns to homepage
Test 'List Your Villa' button navigation
Click on user profile menu (login/signup when not authenticated)
Verify mobile menu functionality on smaller screens
Test search form submission and navigation to search results
Verify footer links are present and functional
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation elements work correctly and route to appropriate pages

testCases.name: Villa Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test the villa search and filtering system
steps: Enter a location in the search bar (e.g., 'Santa Monica')
Select check-in and check-out dates
Set number of guests
Submit the search form
Verify navigation to search results page
Check that search parameters are preserved in URL
Verify villa cards display with proper information (price, location, amenities)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works and displays relevant villa results with proper filtering

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test user login, signup, and authentication states
steps: Click on login/signup in navigation menu
Verify guest login form displays properly
Test form validation with empty fields
Verify guest signup form is accessible
Check host signup option is available
Test password reset functionality link
Verify authentication state changes in navigation after login attempt
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication forms display correctly with proper validation and navigation

testCases.name: Villa Details Page Test
testCases.description: Test individual villa detail pages and booking flow
steps: Click on a featured villa from homepage
Verify villa details page loads with complete information
Check villa photos, description, amenities, and pricing
Verify booking form or booking button is present
Test date picker functionality for booking
Check guest count selector
Verify price calculation updates based on dates/guests
testCases.expectedOutcome: Villa details page displays comprehensive information and functional booking interface

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test homepage on desktop viewport (1200px+)
Resize to tablet viewport (768px-1199px)
Test mobile viewport (320px-767px)
Verify navigation collapses to hamburger menu on mobile
Check search form adapts to smaller screens
Verify villa cards stack properly on mobile
Test touch interactions on mobile devices
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly and remains functional across all screen sizes

testCases.name: Data Loading and Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test data fetching, loading states, and error handling
steps: Observe loading states when featured villas are fetching
Check loading states for popular destinations
Test error handling when API requests fail
Verify retry functionality on failed requests
Check empty state handling when no data is available
Test network connectivity issues handling
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles loading states gracefully and provides appropriate error messages

testCases.name: Host Features and Dashboard Test
steps: Click 'List Your Villa' button
Verify host onboarding or signup process
Test host dashboard accessibility (may require authentication)
Check villa management features
Verify host profile editing capabilities
Test reservation management interface
testCases.expectedOutcome: Host features are accessible and functional for property management

testCases.name: Messaging System Test
steps: Access messaging inbox (may require authentication)
Verify message thread display
Test message composition interface
Check real-time message updates
Verify unread message indicators
Test message thread navigation
testCases.expectedOutcome: Messaging system allows communication between guests and hosts

testCases.name: Wishlist Functionality Test
steps: Access wishlist feature (may require authentication)
Test adding villas to wishlist
Verify wishlist display and organization
Test removing items from wishlist
Check wishlist sharing capabilities
Verify wishlist persistence across sessions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can create and manage wishlists of favorite villas

testCases.name: Complete Booking Flow Test
steps: Select a villa and initiate booking
Fill out guest information form
Review booking details and pricing
Proceed through payment simulation
Verify booking confirmation page
Check booking appears in user's trip history
Test booking cancellation if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete booking process works from villa selection to confirmation

testCases.name: Advanced Search Filters Test
steps: Access search results page
Test price range filters
Filter by number of bedrooms/bathrooms
Test amenity filters (pool, beach access, etc.)
Filter by property type or features
Test sorting options (price, rating, distance)
Verify filter combinations work correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Advanced filters help users narrow down villa search results effectively

testCases.name: Review and Rating System Test
testCases.description: Test review submission and display functionality
steps: View villa reviews and ratings
Test review submission form (may require completed booking)
Verify review editing capabilities
Check review moderation and display
Test rating calculation and display
Verify review helpfulness voting
testCases.expectedOutcome: Review system allows users to share and view experiences with villas

testCases.name: Accessibility and Usability Test
steps: Test keyboard navigation throughout the application
Verify screen reader compatibility with ARIA labels
Check color contrast ratios for text readability
Test focus indicators on interactive elements
Verify form labels and error messages are accessible
Test with browser zoom up to 200%
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is accessible to users with disabilities and follows WCAG guidelines
